question: What is "Asghar Farhadi" famous for?
explanation: Asghar Farhadi is an Iranian film director and screenwriter. Farhadi has received two Oscars for Best Foreign Language Film for his films A Separation (2011) and The Salesman (2016), making him one of the few directors worldwide who have won the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film twice. In 2012, he was included on the annual Time 100 list of the most influential people in the world.
